import {NavBar} from "../Components"; import {useState} from "react"; import {Users} from "./DB"; import {redirect} from "react-router-dom"; export function Registartion(){ const [inputEmail, setInputEmail] = useState('') const [inputPassword, setInputPassword] = useState('') const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const newUser = { 'email': inputEmail, 'password': inputPassword } Users.push(newUser); console.log(newUser); return redirect("/profile"); } return( <>
